translations: 批准；授权给……；证明……正确（authorise 的现在分词，同 authorize）

sentences.sentence: The Conservatives' planning reform explicitly gives rural development priority over conservation, even authorising "off-plan" building where local people might object.
sentences.translation: 保守党的计划改革明确将农村发展置于（自然）保护之上，甚至批准在当地居民可能反对的地方建设“计划外”的建筑。

sentences.sentence: Mr Patrick will introduce a bill authorising these schools later this month.
sentences.translation: 帕特里克州长将于本月晚些时候提交法案，批准建立这三种学校。

sentences.sentence: When authorising payments, many of them signed on removable sticky notes.
sentences.translation: 在授权行贿的时候，很多管理人员只在易撕粘性便签纸上签署。
